long_description: Whether you twist it, flip it, fold it or just slip it on, the Buff Wool Buff(R) will keep your head warm and protected during cold-weather activities. 100% merino wool buff has a soft hand and it wicks, insulates and resists odors naturally; wool provides excellent insulation even when wet. Built-in stretch gives this buff the versatility to be worn 12 different ways, including as a mask, bandana, hairband, balaclava or scarf. Specially treated to be machine washable.
